title: Samba heading south on toll road in France 55 MH I think?

posts.content:
A couple of weeks ago we passed a red/brown Samba in a delivery truck (fabric sided I think with the rear open) heading south on the toll road in France. Passed it too quickly to shout out for a photo! I think the reg was 55 MH?

We also passed a splitty and beetles outside of Albertville which my daughter did manage to photo, pics later.
